ARABIC: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Vessels of silver and goblets of pure crystal will be passed round among them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Passed round will be silver flagons and goblets made of glass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and there shall be passed around them vessels of silver and goblets of crystal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be served with silver dishes and crystal clear goblets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Rounds of silver cups and silver beakers, looking like glass, will be presented upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And among them will be passed round vessels of silver and cups of crystal --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And there shall be made to go round about them vessels of silver and goblets which are of glass,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and there shall be passed around them vessels of silver, and goblets of crystal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Goblets of silver are brought round for them, and beakers (as) of glass
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Vessels of silver and goblets of pure crystal will be passed round among them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And brought round amongst them will be vessels of silver and also goblets of glass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will be served around with vessels of silver and goblets of crystal
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And amongst them will be passed round vessels of silver and goblets of crystal,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And amongst them will be passed round vessels of silver and cups of crystal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and passed around them shall be silver vessels, and crystal goblets,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Passing around them are vessels of silver, and cups of crystal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:15] And they will be waited upon from all around them, in it, with vessels of silver, and goblets (akwāb are cups without handles) of crystal —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Goblets of silver are brought round for them) by servants, (and beakers (as) of glass) without handles or covers
